Tutoring

Well, I'm planning to do tutoring, I'm prioritising my final year of University until Summer of 2024.

But there's no harm in early advertising. I will be available from around June 2024 for any of the following subjects:

  • Maths
  • Physics
  • Computer Science
I am happy to tutor maths and physics up to A-Level, with Computer Science to University Standard

If you or someone you know is looking for Tutoring please feel free to reach out to me :Here!
